sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {SidebarMenu, SidebarLink, SidebarWrapper, SidebarContainer, Icon, CloseIcon} from './SidebarElements'

const Sidebar = ({isOpen, toggle}) => {
    return (
        <SidebarContainer isOpen = {isOpen} onClick={toggle}>
            
            <Icon onClick={toggle}>
                <CloseIcon/>
            </Icon>

            <SidebarWrapper>
                
                <SidebarMenu>
                    <SidebarLink to='about' onClick={toggle} spy={true} exact="true" offset={-80}>About</SidebarLink>
                    <SidebarLink to='projects' onClick={toggle} spy={true} exact="true" offset={-80}>Projects</SidebarLink>
                    <SidebarLink to='contact' onClick={toggle} spy={true} exact="true" offset={-78}>Contact</SidebarLink>
                    <SidebarLink to='donate' onClick={toggle} spy={true} exact="true" offset={-80}>Donate</SidebarLink>
                </SidebarMenu>
            
            </SidebarWrapper>

        </SidebarContainer>
    )
}

export default Sidebar
